scripts.lint: yarn workspace jan lint && yarn workspace jan-web lint
scripts.dev:electron: yarn copy:assets && yarn workspace jan dev
scripts.test-local: yarn lint && yarn build:test && yarn test
scripts.dev:uikit: yarn workspace @janhq/uikit install && yarn workspace @janhq/uikit dev
scripts.build:uikit: yarn workspace @janhq/uikit install && yarn workspace @janhq/uikit build
scripts.build:server: yarn copy:assets && cd server && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.build:core: cd core && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.build:electron: yarn copy:assets && yarn workspace jan build
scripts.build:extensions:windows: rimraf ./pre-install/*.tgz && powershell -command "$jobs = Get-ChildItem -Path './extensions' -Directory | ForEach-Object { Start-Job -Name ($_.Name) -ScriptBlock { param($_dir); try { Set-Location $_dir; npm install; npm run build:publish; Write-Output 'Build successful in ' + $_dir } catch { Write-Error 'Error in ' + $_dir; throw } } -ArgumentList $_.FullName }; $jobs | Wait-Job; $jobs | ForEach-Object { Receive-Job -Job $_ -Keep } | ForEach-Object { Write-Host $_ }; $failed = $jobs | Where-Object { $_.State -ne 'Completed' -or $_.ChildJobs[0].JobStateInfo.State -ne 'Completed' }; if ($failed) { Exit 1 }"
scripts.build:extensions:linux: rimraf ./pre-install/*.tgz && find ./extensions -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d -print0 | xargs -0 -n 1 -P 4 -I {} sh -c 'cd {} && npm install && npm run build:publish'
scripts.build:extensions:darwin: rimraf ./pre-install/*.tgz && find ./extensions -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d -print0 | xargs -0 -n 1 -P 4 -I {} sh -c 'cd {} && npm install && npm run build:publish'
scripts.build:test: yarn copy:assets && yarn build:web && yarn workspace jan build:test
scripts.build:publish: yarn copy:assets && yarn build:web && yarn workspace jan build:publish
